description: This drink offers a new spin on an old favorite for those who want to turn the ordinary into something extraordinary. Blend Fernet Branca and a chocolate beer blend with spiced rum to make one devilishly delicious concoction that’ll make you laugh out loud while it does its job - getting people wasted!
name: The Blackbeard

recipeInstructions.name: Add all ingredients to a shaker without ice. Be careful with the squid ink as it stains.
